explains: n. 疯子，狂人；精神病患者

sentences.en: The killing was the act of a madman.
sentences.cn: 这起凶杀案是一个疯子所为。

sentences.en: He wanted to jump up and run outside, screaming like a madman.
sentences.cn: 他想在外面跑跳，像疯子似的尖叫。

sentences.en: "He drives like a madman," was all the information he vouchsafed.
sentences.cn: “他开车时像个疯子，”这是他给予的全部信息。
